VXLIB Function Reference

Absolute Difference

OpenVX Function Description

  • Computes the absolute difference between two images.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/dc/ddf/group__group__vision__function__absdiff.html

VXLIB APIs

  • VXLIB_absDiff_i8u_i8u_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_absDiff_i16s_i16s_o16s : Input and output images are S16 format
